name: zol
description: Type safe composable SQL abstraction layer

scripts.lint: tslint --type-check --project ./src/tsconfig.json -t codeFrame && tslint --type-check --project ./helper_framework/tsconfig.json -t codeFrame && tslint --type-check --project ./tests/tsconfig.json -t codeFrame && tslint --type-check --project ./benchmarks/tsconfig.json -t codeFrame
scripts.build: tsc --project src && rollup -c && ts-node ./tools/dts-merge.ts ./build/types/zol.d.ts -o ./dist/types/zol.d.ts && typedoc --out dist/docs --target es6 --readme none --mode file --theme minimal --includeDeclarations --excludePrivate --excludeExternals dist/types/zol.d.ts
scripts.test:prod: npm run lint && npm run style && npm run test -- --cov --coverage-report=html --no-browser

author: benny-medflyt <benny@medflyt.com>
